features: 720p HD Resolution - Watch TV in crystal-clear 720p resolution.
Full Array LED Backlight - Evenly distributed LEDs across the screen’s backlight deliver superior light uniformity and picture performance.
IQ Picture Processor - Delivers superior picture processing, faster navigation, and quicker load times to get to your favorite content faster.

VIZIO App Catalog Your VIZIO TV includes an extensive App Catalog where new apps are automatically added and updated – no downloading needed. All the latest apps are instantly available and ready to discover.

WatchFree+ - WatchFree+ is like cable TV, but streaming and free. Watch hundreds of channels of live TV and on demand content including news, sports, movies, TV shows and foreign language programming across an ever-expanding catalog. No logins. No subscriptions. No fees. Just free entertainment.
body.description: Versatility and performance collide with the new VIZIO D-Series HD Smart TV. D-Series comes loaded with a full array backlight for better contrast and uniformity, brilliant 720p HD resolution and an ultra-fast VIZIO IQ processor with support for immersive audio pass-through for Dolby Atmos and DTS:X. Stream it all with the award-winning SmartCast platform loaded with the best selection of built-in apps including WatchFree+ that lets you enjoy free access to live TV and hundreds of free channels right out of the box. SmartCast also works with Apple AirPlay 2 and Chromecast built-in, offering unparalleled entertainment in a size that fits your lifestyle. 1 month promotional period of discovery+ (ad-supported) available to those that purchase and activate a new VIZIO TV by 10/22/2022 and redeem promotion by 11/22/22.* *CANCEL BEFORE 1-MONTH PROMOTIONAL PERIOD ENDS TO AVOID AUTOMATIC MONTHLY FEES. New eligible subscribers only. Taxes apply. Terms apply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Perfectly Right Out Of The Box!
reviews.reviewText: I had one of the previous versions of this TV, same size, still in great condition btw, but the Internet connectivity was always an issue, frequently freezing and dropping in the middle of streaming; although on the plus side, that one still gets updates. I was so frustrated with the performance of my last one, I wasn't going to get another of this brand, but decided to give this updated model a try. I just got it today. Like the other, setup was fast. Improved: it connected to the Internet immediately without connection errors. I also like the new remote design, where the whole back of the remote doesn't come off just for the batteries! I'm waiting for it to complete the updates and hopefully I will be set up and ready to watch my Netflix and play my video games.Update: After a few days of use, I have some feedback. This TV volume doesn't get very loud at all. It's in my bedroom, so it's not in a large space where the sound gets absorbed. Sometimes movies are hard to hear, seems like the actors whispered through the whole show, so I'm pressing the volume button, but it's still sounds too low, no matter how high it goes! My older Vizio has stronger volume than this one, and doesn't even go up to 100 like this new one! Even raised to 40, this doesn't do a lot. At 60-90+ you would expect to be blown away! However this just doesn't kick and needs a stereo system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good tv, and the price is amazing. Super easy to set up and the picture is great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture, great product!
reviews.reviewText: I may be late to the party but, I love my smart tvs! All I have to do is turn it on and press a button and I can watch whatever I want or I can just watch whatever is offered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good TV, Stand needs improvement
reviews.reviewText: TV is great, good condition, easy setup. You definitely need speakers, as the audio is not the greatest.The stand included with the TV on the other hand is unbelievably frustrating. No matter how much you tighten the screws both legs are consistently loose. The TV itself is top heavy and I have to adjust it so it doesn’t fall forwards constantly.It is honestly better with no stand at all.Worth the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a 32 inch tv
reviews.reviewText: Works as advertised, fits my needs. Easy enough to use. Small hiccup if you're somewhere there isn't any internet, will try to update constantly even without internet. When you turn it off there is a minor inconvenience where it tries to populate a tv guide that is inclusive between antenna and wifi. Not really a problem but it seems you cannot turn this auto feature off and just go straight to antenna.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I will never purchase a TV again from Amazon or Vizio. The customer service is horrible when the TV stops working. I tried to get it returned to Amazon. They said their days had passed for me to get it returned to them. I purchased it on October 25 And it stopped working on December 22. I was then redirected to Vizio. She had me do the check on the TV. We spent about 30 to 45 minutes doing this. Unplugging it plugging it back using the remote we did all those things she had me go find the manual turn off and turn on. It’s so far in the back I couldn’t reach it because I can’t hardly walk , I told her I had to use a wheelchair or walker to get to the TV because I’m non-amatory. You would think she would have some understanding about that. Oh no. She said in order for me to return the phone I’ll get some service I had to go through the walk-through and try to see if I can get the TV to work. I called the bureau of business and I registered a complaint about Vizio and their poor service. I told her I still had the box to the TV that I would return it and its original box. If she would either send me a new I called the bureau of business and I registered a complaint about Vizio and their poor service. I told her I still had the box to the TV that I would return it and it’s original box. If she would either send me a new TV or send me my money back . Oh no, she couldn’t do that. They are the worst company in the world and Amazon service has gone down the toilet. I’m thinking about not doing any more purchasing with Amazon either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My television set
reviews.reviewText: Let me first off start by saying this is an awesome TV for the price I feel like I got a great deal the screen is amazing I mean what more could you ask especially the price I paid for it good deal guys

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars inexpensive but not impressive
reviews.reviewText: I needed an inexpensive small TV for the garage and chose the Vizio 32", So far, two issues: (1) image brightness is uneven across the screen. There are three bright spots in the upper middle part of the screen and my eyes seem to focus on them. No playing with the controls changes this problem. (2) the TV was assembled with a defect; the plastic border surrounding the image area was glued on at the op (slightly curved framework) without being fully pressed down. So the bright backup light shines through a narrow gap, maybe 1/16 inch wide in the top middle of the TV. I covered it with black electrical tape to hide the defect and stop the light from showing. Not very impressive, even for the modest cost. But it does work, so it is not a total loss.
